channel.title: Log out button error
channel.description:
Ok so every the first time i click the logout button i get this in my server run.bat
Source edited Server: Exception! java.lang.NullPointerException at client.saveit(client.java:11106) at client.logout(client.java:4286) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:10936) at client.process(client.java:8140) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:168) at server.main(server.java:38) Game saved for player test Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.saveit(client.java:11106) at client.destruct(client.java:3979) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:336) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:188) at server.main(server.java:38)
can anyone help?
